  • Method Details

    • checkOverlaps

      public static boolean checkOverlaps(Timestamp startTimeStamp, Timestamp endTimeStamp, LocalDate dateAdd, int customerIDAdd) throws SQLException
      This method takes a list of appointments from the database, and an appointment the user is trying to add, and runs comparisons. It compares start and end times to determine if the user's appointment has any overlap.
      Parameters:
      startTimeStamp - start time
      endTimeStamp - end time
      dateAdd - date
      customerIDAdd - customer ID
      Returns:
      a boolean
      Throws:
      SQLException - if query is not found

      public static Timestamp convertStringAndDateTimeStamp(String HHmm, LocalDate date)

    • upcomingAppointments

      public static void upcomingAppointments(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> upcomingAppointments)
      This method gets the time of login and compares it to all appointments that day to determine if any are within 15 min.
      Parameters:
      upcomingAppointments - an observable list of appointments
